com.compendium.ui.menus
Class UIMenuManager

java.lang.Object
  com.compendium.ui.menus.UIMenuManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICoreConstants, IUIConstants, java.io.Serializable
public class UIMenuManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements IUIConstants, ICoreConstants

This class creates and managers the main frame's menu.
